questions.question_text: A multinational corporation is planning a big data initiative to help with critical business decisions. Which of the following is the BEST way to ensure personal data usage is standardized across the entire organization?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
By developing a data dictionary, the organization can standardize the usage of personal data, ensuring compliance with regulations, consistent data management practices, and clarity in handling data throughout its big data initiative.
